about_description: I am a full stack developer with experience in the web technology industry providing quality professional expertise ... I am in the capacity to develop and maintain professional web applications. I am passionate about learning new technologies, which allows me to gain experience of this fact I am constantly learning.
intro_paragraph: I like general culture, sport in particular football, basketball and tennis, I really like music, reading, and video games
experience_paragraph: I like to gain new experience by creating new solutions that will help people in daily need or help improve the management of their various activities. This is how I participated in several projects, being part of a team to provide solutions in various sectors of activity such as finance, education, E-commerce, etc...
collaboration: I had to work on several projects, the majority of which were team projects and other projects were personal. The work that was done in all teams was strict, fast, efficient and very professional.

description_skills: During my many experiences and learning, I had to work on several works that allowed me to touch several technologies, CMS, and frameworks in several languages ​​on the one hand and on the other hand to improve my design experience.
